questions.question: Le livre ___ j'ai besoin est sur la table.
questions.explanation: 'Dont' is used because it replaces an object of the preposition 'de' in 'avoir besoin de'.

questions.question: La fille ___ je parle est ma sœur.
questions.explanation: 'Dont' is used because it replaces an object of the preposition 'de' in 'parler de'.

questions.question: Le film ___ nous avons vu était génial.
questions.explanation: 'Que' is used because it is the direct object of the verb 'avons vu'.

questions.question: L'homme ___ est venu hier est mon ami.
questions.explanation: 'Qui' is used because it is the subject of the verb 'est venu'.

questions.question: Le livre ___ tu as lu est intéressant.
questions.explanation: 'Que' is used because it is the direct object of the verb 'as lu'.

questions.question: La femme ___ travaille ici est gentille.
questions.explanation: 'Qui' is used because it is the subject of the verb 'travaille'.
